title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.05 - STOP Sign (R1-1) and ALL WAY Plaque (R1-3P)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.05 - STOP Sign (R1-1) and ALL WAY Plaque (R1-3P)

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 09. INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 08A The R1-10P plaque shall not be used in New

York. Notes

2B.05

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
